DIGITAL EXPERIENCE

We offer strategic design, functionality and marketing
solutions to provide a superior experience for your client.

About
Reactive20tm

Reactive 20 was born from the desire to create complete digital solutions, combining our design experience, technical know-how, and marketing skills. In the development of our products we approach a holistic orientation, starting from the analysis of your business purpose, the brand identity, and the functionalities desired. We analyze the digital space in which your business operates and its competitors and we find differentiating factors to make your website remarkable. Using clearly defined processes we deliver digital solutions focused on your customer's gratifying experience, creating a competitive advantage for your business.

Portfolio

We develop customized digital experiences for businesses that want to expand their presence in the online environment. Our solutions are guided by the desire to create platforms that are appreciated by users, both for ease of use and creative design. We are not afraid to leave our comfort zone, we are afraid not to do it. We are happy when our customers come with different and challenging ideas for their business, the more difficult the problem, the greater the energy and creativity with which we approach it. Open our portfolio to see some of the solutions we have offered so far.

Project name

Our services

marketing

We generate and implement marketing solutions based on the analysis of the attributes of regular and ideal customers, the sales funnel and the brand strategy. We increase the visibility of your brand and attract new customers using ads built following the most actual and efficient models from your field. We help you develop the sales process using validated methods such as AIDA (attention, interest, desire, action), value first, etc. to increase the conversion rate of your funnel. We maximize the lifetime value of each current customer by retargeting with relevant ads using a compelling message and tone that suits your costumer. “People don’t want to buy a quarter-inch drill. They want a quarter-inch hole! ”

Web development
